    movePlayerBackwardByOne(Player) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.game.FlightBoardImplementation
    movePlayerBackwardByOne() removes the player from their current cell, and moves them to the first cell before the one they're currently in that is found to be free
    movePlayerByN(Player, int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.game.FlightBoardFacade
    movePlayerByN is a facade method that encapsulate the complexity of moving a specific player by making use of methods of FlightBoardImplementation
    movePlayerForwardByOne(Player) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.game.FlightBoardImplementation
    movePlayerForwardByOne() removes the player from their current cell, and moves them to the next free cell
